title: LFT Currently Platinum ( Up coming shot caller)
body:
Hey guys!
Been a player since Season 1. Looking to get into competitive gameplay for League of Legends!
Can play any role and can pick up champions fairly quickly.
Peaked at Diamond Rank 2 a couple season back with Master MMR but soon lost interest in the game due to not many competitively driven players in my team.
I like to games strategically and have a good relay of information. I can also shot call but still learning to do it better.
I also Watch alot of competitive gameplay domestic and internationally.
Played JG 3 seasons
Then transitioned to Mid
Then Support
Then Top
Then ADC

Add me in game IGN: Wolves
http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=Wolves
